title: reflect.MakeSlice change request
body:
by **axel.schreiner**: 
reflect.MakeSlice requires a SliceType argument but only seems to use it to get the
element type to 
construct a new slice.

It would be much more useful if it required the element type instead.

What is your $GOOS?  $GOARCH?
darwin amd64 and 386

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)
